div.p: The spatial distribution of monthly averaged differences of ( a) Chem_O 3, ( b) Advt_O 3, and ( c) Vmix_O 3 between FUTMET and PREMET during the daytime (from 7:00 to 18:00 LST). Chem_O 3 represents the O 3 chemical production process. Vmix_O 3 means the contribution of vertical mixing and dry deposition to O 3. Advt_O 3 means the contribution of horizontal and vertical advections.
